body.p: The undersigned would respectfully represent to His Excellency the Governor of Kentucky that S M Moody a convict in the State Prison is a proper subject for Executive clemency -- He has been faithful and constant in his discharge of all duties entrusted to him and seems truly repentant for his past offences -- We believe that restored to liberty he will make an useful and honest member of society -- Hoping the favorable consideration of your Excellency we subscribe ourselves
P Armstrong West Point Hardin Co the person that was injured by said Moody and who prosecuted him

J W South
Jas S Sneed
Clk Ky Penty
John.W. Shannon
D. M, Bowen
L S Prentiss
R. W. Lawler
R W Wilhoit
L. C. South
R K Taylor
Jno C Bates
Arch, P, Williams
James Gallahue
J, T, Hoskensmith
